description: Try our easy to follow Chilli Con Carne Pita Nachos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chilli Con Carne Pita Nachos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add mince, garlic, cumin and chilli. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring to break up the mince. Add tomato paste, grated zucchini and mashed sweet potato. Cook for a further 2-3 minutes or until reduced.

Slice pita into triangles and place into baking dish. Bake for 5 minutes, top with mince and cheese then bake for 5 minutes or until cheese is golden. Remove from the oven and top with avocado and tomatoes. Serve with yoghurt.
